scripts.build:api: cargo lambda build --package api --output-format zip --arm64 --release && mv target/lambda/api/bootstrap.zip target/lambda/api/api.zip
scripts.build:stream-processor: cargo lambda build --package stream-processor --output-format zip --arm64 --release && mv target/lambda/stream-processor/bootstrap.zip target/lambda/stream-processor/stream-processor.zip
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:stream-processor
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && serverless deploy --stage prod
